《'''Warriors'''》是《[[英雄联盟]]》的S4全球总决赛主题曲。

== 简介 ==
《'''Warriors'''》是2014年《[[英雄联盟]]》S4全球总决赛主题曲，由美国摇滚乐队Imagine Dragons演绎。

== 歌曲 ==

{{BilibiliVideo|title=Warriors MV|id=1599826|width=600|height=421|autoplay=false}}

== 歌词 ==
{{Lyrics
|lang=en
|lb-text1    = As a child, you would wait
|rb-text1    = 身为孩子，你会等待
|lb-text2    = And watch from far away
|rb-text2    = 远远的观望
|lb-text3    = But you always knew that you'll be the one
|rb-text3    = 但你一直知道自己是那个
|lb-text4    = that work while they all play
|rb-text4    = 在别人玩耍时努力的人
|lb-text5    = And you, you lay, awake at night and scheme
|rb-text5    = 你夜不能寐，有所图谋
|lb-text6    = of all the things that you would change
|rb-text6    = 想要改变一切

|rb-text7    = 但这只是梦想
